backend/main.mo: Main backend canister handling user profiles, registrations, OTP generation/verification, admin login credentials, and access control via mixins and maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a splash screen branding update and listing affected files, components, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables and themes including light/dark palettes, borders, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root app container, title, and font imports.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component handling splash screen, view switching between registration and admin, and registration flow resets.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Animated splash screen component showing company name with reduced‑motion support and skip behavior.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPanel.t: Admin panel with authentication, registration list/detail views, edit/delete flows, and admin claim/recovery logic.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: UI card enabling admin access recovery via setup code or username/password login with error handling and loading states.
Error boundary that catches render failures in admin detail views and provides a retry option.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/D: Component that loads and displays document images with placeholders, error handling, and retry support.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/E: Form for editing registration fields with change detection, validation, and save/cancel handling.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/R: Panel showing registration details with loading, error, empty, and delete states plus admin actions.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useAdm: React Query mutation for admin password login that normalizes errors and refreshes admin-related queries on success.
Provides admin-related queries and mutations, including admin checks, role fetch, registrations, and resilient registration-with-receipt lookup.
Applies an admin setup code, stores it in session, and forces reinitialization and refetching of admin-related queries.
frontend/src/features/registration/compo: Error boundary that catches step-level errors and shows a refresh prompt with technical details.
frontend/src/features/registration/hooks: Defines mutations for OTP generation, OTP verification, and final registration submission with file-to-blob conversions.
frontend/src/features/registration/Regis: Manages the multi‑step registration workflow, handling step transitions, validation, and data collection for customer details, documents, terms, and OTP.
frontend/src/features/registration/steps: Renders and validates the customer details form, reporting validity and data changes upward.
Handles OTP generation, verification, and triggers final registration submission, showing success upon completion.
Displays terms and conditions with print-proof layout and tracks acceptance to report validation with a timestamp.
Handles Aadhaar, PAN, and optional payment receipt uploads with previews and reports validation only when inputs change.
frontend/src/features/registration/terms: Defines structured router and service terms used in the registration flow.
frontend/src/features/registration/types: Provides TypeScript types for customer details, documents, and step props in the registration process.
frontend/src/features/registration/valid: Validates customer details fields including required fields, phone, age, email, and address rules.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based theme definitions, dark mode, admin theme, splash animations, and print styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clean them from the hash for routing flows.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, fonts, and plugins for styling the frontend.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, requirements, features, architecture notes, and known issues for the customer registration app.
